bool CIccCreateXformHintManager::AddHint ( IIccCreateXformHint *  pHint)

Adds and owns the passed named hint to it's list.

Name: CIccCreateXformHintManager::AddHint

Purpose: Adds and owns the passed named hint to it's list.

Args: pHint = pointer to the hint object to be added

Return: true = hint added to the list false = hint not added
